issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Other extensions used: | cookie auto delete

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJ1OkL5YMj8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DeJ1OkL5YMj8) ### Comment > This fault is 100% repeatable on this iMc 18,3 and OS. > > I run the OS because it is the last Apple OS which runs 32-bit code. > > Whenever Youtube is loaded, I almost always see a 'Connect to Internet / Retry' page. The Retry button does not work, and I have to use the Reload button for the page. > > After reloading, the desired ad-sponsored video will often show a black screen with the loading circle, and the Comments section is white with a loading circle. This continues indefinitely. The only way to play the video is to turn off AdGuard and reload. > > On other occasions, the video Comments load, but the video frame is black with a countdown timer for partially suppressed ads. No ad audio is heard. After the Google-generated `Skip Ads' button becomes visible, the video will play normally. > > Only videos without superimposed ads play properly, but this is usually after having to reload the page. > > These bugs still persist after a complete system shutdown and reboot. And they still occur after Adguard has been deleted and then re-installed. Username: `@g0mrb` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3a0usme5zkis84oc8g04sog004cwss4q3ob192ck5c.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ixgrw5hssp44wos4owccws4g4g0w400ggmqwpri4wg.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.15 System version: | macOS Mojave 10.14.6 Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
Adblock Warning Removal List,
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Other extensions used: | none
